title: Recept na odvar de Vries
content:
Recept na odvar de Vries

Odvar de Vries: makes it possible to spot invisible opponents.

This scroll contains the formula for Odvar de Vries, which makes it possible to spot invisible enemies.

Zápisy do Deníku

Receptury: Odvar de Vries

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
400  	80  




Lokace
Triss gives Geralt this svitek after he places the sensors for Zřídlo
Poustevník
Kalkstein, ve Staré Wyzimě
